patthana23.41:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ navipākaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho vipāko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.41:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ navipākadhammadhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho vipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.41:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nanevavipākanavipākadhammadhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho nevavipākanavipākadhammadhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.41:6.3: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … aññamaññe tīṇi … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
